title: Tracks
contents: Tracks are a highly-armored propulsion for vehicles.
They provide a large amount of hitpoints, as well as high resistances against Anti-Personnel and Artillery damage.
However, they come at a higher production cost, have longer build times, and are still very vulnerable to Anti-Tank weapons.
Additionally, Tracks come with a hefty penalty to their maximum speed.
Due to their high durability, Tracks are perfect for vehicles designed for combat on the front lines.
Care must be taken, however. Their slow movement speed can make escaping unfavorable situations very difficult.
